Title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in getkirby/cms.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.5.7 before 3.5.8.1, all versions starting from 3.6.0 before 3.6.6.1, all versions starting from 3.7.0 before 3.7.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.5.7, all versions starting from 3.5.8.1 before 3.6.0, all versions starting from 3.6.6.1 before 3.7.0, all versions starting from 3.7.4
